data.text: @PriscillaMonre1 Hi, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We would suggest for you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer. If it doesn't work, you can try using a different browser. Best regards.
@SharonS14284224 Hello, we send you a reply to the DM. Regards.
@happykappy7 Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@CMShin4 Hi, in order to carry the respective validation, please send us via DM your reservation code and the passenger's full name. We look forward to your response. Regards.

@DFigurito This case regarding your account has already been escalated and continues to be worked on by our department in charge. As soon as we have a follow-up or outcome, you will be immediately notified by email. We appreciate your patience and understanding. Regards.
@DFigurito Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the case number or the associated email. We look forward to your response.
@JulieGol Hola, te enviamos un DM. Saludos.
@laviejadelgato Te respondimos por Dm, saludos.
@laviejadelgato Hola, bríndanos mayor detalle por DM, quedamos atentos.
@AprilClaggett Hi, in order to carry out the respective validation, please send us via DM more details about your request. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@CAR_nyc Hola, te enviamos un DM. Saludos.

As of today, we make our #Solidarity Plane available to the UN Agency for Refugees (@ACNURamericas), transporting passengers and humanitarian aid at no cost and supporting the people who had to leave their homes looking for peace and safety. https://t.co/1TUadICl7O

data.text: @grassrootgalt Hello. Tour comments help us to improve our service and the experience we offer to our passengers, you can file a request on the following link with your comments https://t.co/Vf6dbtaSbc. Kind regards.
@grassrootgalt We are glad to know that it was a good experience with us, we will make sure to send your congratulations to the indicated area. Thank you very much for your comments.
@grassrootgalt Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@PNW__Tyler It is our pleasure. We will be here to help you whenever you need it., however the seat upgrade applies according to the service policy. Have a good flight. Regards.

@PNW__Tyler We suggest you to make the process at the airport, by this means if you provide us by DM with your reservation and full name of the passenger we can add your passport number, if you want extra help let us know to review it. Regards.
@MarioRdCh Hola, envíanos por DM el código de reserva y nombres con apellidos para asistirte. Quedamos atentos.

@AleLFranks Hello, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@RodrigoMadaria6 Hola, te hemos respondido vía DM.
@PNW__Tyler We suggest you to make the process at the airport. Regards.
@PNW__Tyler Hi, please enter the following link https://t.co/RColKEfTpE to upload the requirement documentation, in case you still have issues, it will have to be at the airport. Regards.

data.text: @DeboraDipapidis Hello, in order to help you out, please provide us by DM with your reservation code, along with the full name of the passenger. Regards.
@avgeekwithlens 🤩 ✈️
@nikkitidbury Great picture, Nikki! Thank you for sharing! 👏 ✈️
@_Travelwithdan ✈️ ❤️ 💙
@chancaydeamedio Hi, we have sent you a message by DM. Regards.
@panchita0197 Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@Martacifu2004 Hola, bríndanos tu número de caso al DM para poder ayudarte. Quedamos atentos.
@laironiaviva Hi, we've sent a DM. Regards.
@Br13Ed We encourage you to submit your concerns through the following link https://t.co/PYyOT12a6Q. Regards.
@naturaldrug Hi, please send us via DM your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you. Regards.
@danjzs1 Hi, please send us via inbox your booking reference and full name of the passenger to check this with you further. Regards.
@ninajofre Hola, por favor envíanos un DM con más detalles de lo sucedido. Saludos.
@fuerzacristal36 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@alekhyaaudi Hi, in order to carry out the respective validation, please send us via DM the reservation code and the passenger's full name. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@abbott_raghav Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@m_oregan Hi, please get in touch with our luggage department using the following link: https://t.co/PbfuM6mS72  Regards
@j_alvcuretti Hola, con el fin de poder asistirte, envíanos al DM tu número de caso creado. Quedamos atentos.
@LuciaAllain1 Hi, in order to assist you, please send us via DM more details about your request. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@flightlevelfoto You can find our accepted payment methods at the following link: https://t.co/xmuzvxDL41 Regards.

@ELeonard_ Hi Elisabeth, in order to assist you please send us by private message the travel voucher number, holder full name, email address, amount, type, number and country of issue of the identity document. We stay tuned.

@flightlevelfoto Hi, your browser's history or cookies can sometimes affect the web page. For this reason, we ask you to delete them and try to make the purchase one more time, or try to use a different browser or device (preferably a computer). Regards.
@CHRIS_TORRESNY Hi Chris, we want to look into this. Please send us more details and also include your flight information via DM. Regards.
@grassrootgalt Hi, in order to check the best way to assist you, please send us by private message the ticket number and the passenger's full name. We will stay tuned.

@RebecaSeman Hi Rebeca, you should know that due to the high number of applications we are submitting the resolution time has been extended, we have attached your comments to speed up the process, we invite you to keep an eye on your email. Best regards.
@michellee011 Hi, in order to carry out the respective validation, please send us via DM, your reservation code and the passenger's full name. We look forward to your response. Regards.
@thitoro We've sent a link to complete the payment for the seat you mentioned. Regards.
@thitoro Hi, send us via DM the reservation code, passenger's full name and the desired seats. Regards.
@thitoro Hi, in order to carry the respective validations, please send us via DM the details of your trip and the desired seats. Regards.
@AnarosaCal Hi, in order to check if we can assist you, please let us know via DM more details about your request. We look forward to your response. Reagrds.
@JohnPabloNY Hello, please send us to DM the case number with which your refund is being worked on, so we can review it. We stay tuned.
@edufrediani Sim, Ed. A segurança é um fator imprescindível. A viagem está programada para amanhã, dia 19/03 às 23h05. Permanecemos à disposição, se precisar.
@aliceepalace Hello, we have sent you a DM, Greetings.
@edufrediani Olá Ed, bom dia. Por favor, poderia informar o protocolo do caso que se refere para analisarmos o ocorrido? Ficamos no aguardo. Obrigado.

@raposete Hello, you should know that we have verified the case you have open with us, and this is still being worked by our specialist area, we have attached your comments to speed up the response time. As soon as we have the resolution you will be notified via email. Best regards.
@raposete Hi, in order to assist you choose one language to be assisted. We will be waiting for your reply.

@luftlatin Hola, puedes validar precios, disponibilidad y comprar de tus boletos ingresando en el siguiente enlace; https://t.co/pXOYp8LjLZ, recuerda que todas nuestras tarifas se encuentran sujetas a cambios y disponibilidad sin previo aviso. Esperamos tenerte a bordo ✈. Saludos.

urls.description: ¡Aprovecha los increíbles descuentos y ofertas en vuelos que te ofrece LATAM Airlines! Reserva tu viaje ahora y disfruta de la mejor experiencia

data.text: @naturaldrug Hello, we are glad to know that you had a good experience with us, we will make sure to take into account your congratulations with the area in charge. Thank you for your comments.
@fuerzacristal36 In order to assist you we need you to provide us with the information requested by private message. We will stay tuned.

@jiaertk Si deseas solicitar una compensación por el atraso, debes acercarte a nuestro counter, esta solicitud será sujeta a evaluación. También puedes realizar un reclamo en el enlace: https://t.co/TErrBibW3J. Saludos.
@jiaertk Hola, indícanos el número de vuelo al que te refieres vía DM para brindarte más información, por favor. Quedamos atentos.
@patriciaomg Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@nalegriae Hello, please provide us via DM with your case number. We're looking forward for your response.

@ChiAlma Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@maidaverdugo Hola, con el fin de brindarte una debida atención, envianos tu requerimiento al inbox. Saludos.
@Alberto41513656 As soon as we have an update about your case, we will let you know through email. Regards.
@Alberto41513656 We understand your annoyance with the time it has taken to resolve your case, however, we keep working with the purpose of providing you with an update as soon as possible. Regards.

@Alberto41513656 Hi, we understand that this is far from ideal since our main interest is the satisfaction of our passengers. Rest assured that we are currently working on your case, and we are doing everything possible to provide you with a prompt solution. Please keep an eye on your email.
@pf_chang Hello, please send us a DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger as well as the desired seat numbers. We stay tuned.

@carla_mich Hello, please send us by DM in a detailed way your doubts and concerns, along with the full name of the passenger and booking code to check this with you further. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.
@HOMEROS2010 Hola, te sugerimos ingresar aquí: https://t.co/pHD5wO9lfO. Saludos.
@dReoo0 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@Smokemastersba Hi, for proper assistance, please choose just one language: Spanish, English, or Portuguese, and send us via DM more details about your request. We look forward to your response. Regards.

Planning your next trip? We invite you to review our interactive map to know the health restrictions you must consider when traveling. ✈️Get to know them here: https://t.co/J4MCg59xE3 https://t.co/dmZvApal6W

data.text: @Alberto41513656 Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@edufrediani [+] Nos envie também comprovante dos gastos gerados para análise e tentativa de minimizar todo o transtorno. Ficamos no aguardo.

@edufrediani Ed, entendemos os seus comentários e insatisfação. E, pedimos desculpas por todo esse desconforto. Por favor, nos informe, via DM, o bilhete de viagem e e-mail. Iremos registrar esse ocorrido. [+]

@edufrediani [+] Pedimos desculpas por essa situação totalmente alheia a nossa vontade e reforçamos que a segurança é um valor imprescindível e, sobretudo, todas as nossas suas decisões visam garantir uma operação segura.

@edufrediani [+]  Os passageiros foram reacomodados em outros voos da companhia previstos para decolar a partir de hoje (12). Estamos prestando toda assistência aos passageiros, incluindo hospedagem e alimentação. [+]

@edufrediani [+] Por conta do procedimento, o voo LA8191 (Miami- São Paulo/Guarulhos), programado para operar com a mesma aeronave e decolar de Miami às 21h20 (horário local) do mesmo dia (12), foi cancelado. [+]

domain.name: Cities

data.text: @edufrediani Olá Ed, informamos que a aeronave do voo LA 8194 (São Paulo/Guarulhos –Miami), que decolou às 10h15 de ontem (11), colidiu com um pássaro nas proximidades do aeroporto de Miami. A aeronave aterrissou em completa segurança às 16h20 (horário local), e passará por manutenção. [+]
